===Origin and overview===
The '''Pirate of [[Tarakus]]''' (a city at the west-southern coast edge of [[Ptartha]], a southern land of [[Lemuria (Pacific Ocean)|Lemuria]] circa 500,000 BC) were seemingly a federation or brotherhood of pirates, led by the [[Pirate King (Tarakus) (Earth-616)|Pirate King]].{{r|Creatures on the Loose #22}}

===Thongor of Valkarth===
The last survivor of the [[Black Hawk Tribe (Earth-616)|Black Hawk Tribe]] of the northern land [[Valkarth]], the [[barbarian]] warrior [[Thongor (Earth-616)|Thongor]] was captured in the cities of the south for being an assassin and a thief, and was made a galley slave on the ships of [[Shembis]]. He led a slaves' mutiny and captured the galley, and eventually claimed power and treasure among the pirates of Tarakus.<!-- {{r|Creatures on the Loose #22}} -->

The Pirate King was eventually killed by Thongor during a duel. The King's hordes tried to slay Thongor for his deed, causing him to abandon piracy and leave.{{r|Creatures on the Loose #22}}
